    • Field Detail

      • POPULATION_SIZE

        private static final int POPULATION_SIZE
        Size of the population that will be generated.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • GENERATION_SIZE

        private static final int GENERATION_SIZE
        Number of generations. If we don't have any feasible code generations, a new guess with new generations and populations will be made.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FEASIBLE_CODES_MAX

        private static final int FEASIBLE_CODES_MAX
        Max number of feasible codes. When the FEASIBLE_CODES_MAX is reached, we stop producing feasible codes and we choose one randomly
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • gameGuesses

        private final java.util.ArrayList<ColorRow> gameGuesses
        Array with the GeneticComputer previous attempts

      • turnBlacks

        private final java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> turnBlacks
        Array with the GeneticComputer previous black results

      • turnWhites

        private final java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> turnWhites
        Array with the GeneticComputer previous white results

      • fitness

        private final java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> fitness
        Array that contains the fitness of each population. Fitness[i] contains the fitness of population[i]

      • feasibleCodes

        private final java.util.ArrayList<ColorRow> feasibleCodes
        Array with all the feasible codes found.

      • population

        private java.util.ArrayList<ColorRow> population
        Array with the population generated

      • parentPos

        private java.lang.Integer parentPos
        Integer used to choose 2 ColorRows for the crossover

      • getName

        Specified by:

      • breakerGuess

        public ColorRow breakerGuess(int pegs,
                             int colors)
        Compute the next guess. To do it, initialises a random population, and calculates the fitness for that population. After that, generates new population using crossover, mutation, inversion and permutation, until it has enough feasible codes, and returns one of those randomly.
        Specified by:
        breakerGuess in class Player
        Parameters:
        pegs - is the number of pegs in the combination
        colors - is the number of different possible colors in a combination
        Returns:
        the combination that is going to be tried

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Specified by:
        receiveControl in class Player
        Parameters:
